title: ET is (probably) out there -- get ready
description: SETI researcher Seth Shostak bets that we will find extraterrestrial life in the next twenty-four years, or he'll buy you a cup of coffee. He explains why new technologies and the laws of probability make the breakthrough so likely -- and predicts how the discovery of civilizations far more advanced than ours might affect us here on Earth.
author: Seth Shostak
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, astronomy, extraterrestrial life, life, science, technology, space, cosmos, Planets, exploration, data, math, future, NASA, universe, humanity, prediction, philosophy
